The expert: s verdict states that the claim is being used as part of the attacks between Kingston and his opponent David Perdue in the GOP primary runoff for the U.S. Senate.
The expert mentions that PolitiFact has: s record on earmarks and now they will delve into the second part of the claim regarding Kingston's votes on raising his own pay.
The expert explains that Perdue: s claim is based on procedural votes that Kingston cast, which blocked efforts to eliminate automatic pay raises, rather than actual votes in favor of raising congressional salaries.
